description.displayText: It's with much pleasure that I'm able to recommend Maribel as a babysitter. She practically helped me raise my two daughters now (ages 5 and 7).  Maribel watched A. from the time she was six months old until she was three years old and T. my youngest from five months old until she was three years old as well. What I remember most about Maribel was her consistently arriving  at our home on time, she always appeared ready to engage with our kids, with a smile on. She was always super  kind, compassionate, and understanding . My children really love spending time with her.

description.displayText: She watched my daughter for two years.  My experience with her was wonderful.  She was very nurturing and caring.  My daughter would always cry when I would pick her up because she always wanted to stay longer.  She did lots of learning activities with her and they went on outings to libraries and parks.  Most importantly, she had so much patience with my child.  I would highly recommend her to any parent!
